A

AllowConcurrentEvents - Annotation Type in com.diffplug.common.eventbus
Marks an event subscriber method as being thread-safe.
AsyncEventBus - Class in com.diffplug.common.eventbus
An EventBus that takes the Executor of your choice and uses it to dispatch events, allowing dispatch to occur asynchronously.

C

com.diffplug.common.eventbus - package com.diffplug.common.eventbus
The EventBus allows publish-subscribe-style communication between components without requiring the components to explicitly register with one another (and thus be aware of each other).

D

DeadEvent - Class in com.diffplug.common.eventbus
Wraps an event that was posted, but which had no subscribers and thus could not be delivered.
DeadEvent(Object, Object) - Constructor for class com.diffplug.common.eventbus.DeadEvent
Creates a new DeadEvent.

E

EventBus - Class in com.diffplug.common.eventbus
Dispatches events to listeners, and provides ways for listeners to register themselves.
EventBus() - Constructor for class com.diffplug.common.eventbus.EventBus
Creates a new EventBus named “default”.
EventBus(String) - Constructor for class com.diffplug.common.eventbus.EventBus

EventBus(SubscriberExceptionHandler) - Constructor for class com.diffplug.common.eventbus.EventBus

G

getEvent() - Method in class com.diffplug.common.eventbus.DeadEvent

P

R
